SENT.plain: Neuro-vasculo-Behçet's disease is considered a venous vessel disease generally in the form of cerebral venous thrombosis
Arterial involvement has been rarely reported
We present a patient with neuro-Behçet's disease who developed reversible basilar artery occlusion
To the best of our knowledge, this is the first case of neuro-Behçet's disease presenting with reversible basilar artery occlusion
Behçet's disease should be considered in the differential diagnosis of basilar artery occlusion
